mapper.insert: insert into e_record_task(name, startTime, status) values (#{name}, now(), #{status, typeHandler=com.hust.bill.electric.dao.TaskStatusTypeHandler})
mapper.update: update e_record_task set status = #{status, typeHandler=com.hust.bill.electric.dao.TaskStatusTypeHandler} where id = #{id}
update e_record_task set endTime = now() where id = #{id}
update e_record_task set resultCount = (select count(buildingName) from e_record_task_result where taskId = #{id}) where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from e_record_task where name = #{name}
select id, name, startTime, endTime, resultCount, status from e_record_task
select id, name, startTime, endTime, resultCount, status from e_record_task where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into e_record_task_result(taskId, buildingName, remainCount, chargeCount, stamp) values (#{taskID}, #{buildingName}, #{remainCount}, #{chargeCount}, now())
mapper.select: select id, taskId, buildingName, remainCount, chargeCount from e_record_task_result where taskId= #{taskID}
select area, name, floor from e_building where name not in (select buildingName from e_record_task_result where taskId = #{taskId});
select buildingName, roomName, max(stamp) stamp, remain from e_record_remain where buildingName=#{buildingName} group by roomName;
